name: Illusory Demonic Globe, the Earth
text: : Produce . Spend this will only to play activate abilities of J/resonators, Judgment abilities of "Conqueror of the Black Moon, Gill Lapis" or God's Art abilities of "Gill Lapis, the Primogenitor". , banish this card: If your J-ruler is "Gill Lapis, the Primogenitor", put it into your ruler area, as a ruler.
